meanings: but, however, (그럼에도 불구하고) though, nevertheless, (formal) nonetheless, (여전히) still, all the same, (어쨌든) anyway, at any rate
whether someone does something or not

examples.korean: I can’t say I like Mark very much, but I don’t wish him any harm. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 마크를 대단히 좋아한다고는 할 수 없지만 그래도 그에게 무슨 안 좋은 일이 생기는 것은 바라지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can’t say I like Mark very much, but I don’t wish him any harm. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ll make a tennis player of you yet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그래도 널 테니스 선수로 만들 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll make a tennis player of you yet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The water was cold but I took a shower anyway. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물이 찼다. 그래도 나는 샤워를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The water was cold but I took a shower anyway. Add to Wordbook
